item.description:
Please join us for a discussion of Chapter 3 of "The Artist's Way" or Chapter 2 of "Finding Water." We'll spend the first half hour reviewing chapter topics, followed by an hour in small group chapter discussions, with at least one group dedicated to "Finding Water." We'll end with a half hour of general conversation.

Please bring a copy of the book you're following and a pen or pencil. ** You should read the appropriate book and chapter before coming to the meetup so we can discuss the main topics **

Copies of "The Artist's Way: A Spiritual Path to Higher Creativity" by Julia Cameron are listed as being available now at the Main, O'Neill, and Valente branches of the Cambridge Public Library, and at Somerville Main Branch. More information on finding either book in this discussion.

Information about parking and public transportation near Gallery 263 can be found in the comments below.

**Please note that we are still meeting at 7pm **

If you are able, please bring a $5 donation to the Gallery for the use of their space -- thank you!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet you at the door
item.name: Artists Way Cambridge Meetup
